mapper.select: select a.*,b.inventory_number from t_drug a, (select drug_id,sum(inventory_number) inventory_number from t_inventory group by drug_id) b where a.drug_id=b.drug_id and a.state=1

select a.*,b.drug_name,b.spec,c.admin_name,d.parameter_name from t_inventory a,t_drug b,t_admin c ,t_parameter d where a.drug_id=b.drug_id and a.admin_id=c.admin_id and a.state=d.parameter_value and d.parameter_type='药房库存状态' and a.drug_id=#{_parameter} order by a.cdate desc

select a.*,b.drug_name,c.admin_name,d.parameter_name from t_inventory a,t_drug b,t_admin c ,t_parameter d where a.drug_id=b.drug_id and a.admin_id=c.admin_id and a.state=d.parameter_value and d.parameter_type='药房库存状态' and a.state!=1 and a.state!=2
